price: (98) Or did the people of the cities feel secure from Our punishment coming to them in the morning while they were at play?[386]
arabic: أَوَأَمِنَ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓ أَن يَأۡتِيَهُم بَأۡسُنَا ضُحٗى وَهُمۡ يَلۡعَبُونَ
footnotes: [386]- i.e., occupied with such activities that have no benefit.
